title: Le Systeme du Docteur Terrier = Dr Terrier's System
brief_description:
The newly wed Vidocqs spend their honeymoon at Annette’s godfather’s. They receive a visit from strange characters whom Vidocq used to know when he was a convict in Toulon. They blackmail Vidocq into helping them with their forged money scheme.

Credits: Producer, Etienne Laroche ; director, Claude Loursais ; writer, Georges Neveux ; photography, Maurice Damien ; music, Serge Gainsbourg.
Cast: Bernard Noel, Alain Mottet, Genevieve Fontanel, Henri Cremieux, Jacques Dhery, Gilberte Geniat, Marion Loran, Harry Max, Jacques Seiler.
